name: Bazo
author: Bazo

sections.description:
Helps easy add Bazo.io tracker to your site

Support

We provide support for our plugin on bazo.io

Follow Us

  • Our Website – https://bazo.io/
  • Our Facebook Page – https://www.facebook.com/BAZOio-1213306755414411/
sections.installation:
• Upload the Bazo plugin to your site then Activate it.
  • Enter Bazo tracker in Bazo settings page and click submit button.
  • Done!
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Fix missing bazo icon on shortcut visual editor
  • Add dynamic validation
  • Some visual tweaks

1.3.2

  • Fix use suffix and lowernext together

1.3.1

  • Added suffix parameter to shortcode
  • Small fixes in shortcode usage description

1.3

  • Add visual shortcode builder
  • Add new parameters to shortcode
  • Small fixes and optimization

1.2.1

  • Fix load shortcode data.

1.2

  • Add shortcode [bazo-company name=”altText”] to display recognized company.

1.1.5

  • Add compatibility to older PHP version

1.1.4

  • Optimization
  • Tested up to WordPress 5.2

1.1.3

  • Add bazo number validation
  • Show info about cache when cache plugin is detected
  • Small fixes

1.1.2

  • Small fixes

1.1.1

  • Fix undefined constant
  • Hide script when no track is set
  • Required minumum PHP 5.6

1.1

  • Fix Sanitize

1.0

  • First release
